title: IoT Lab
content: The IoT Lab focuses on bridging the gap between physical devices and the digital world. With hands-on workshops, projects, and events, the lab fosters innovation in the field of the Internet of Things, providing students opportunities to develop cutting-edge solutions for real-world challenges.

title: GeeksforGeeks
content: The GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter at KIIT is dedicated to enhancing coding skills and technical knowledge among students. With regular coding contests, workshops, and peer learning sessions, the chapter provides a platform for students to excel in programming and problem-solving.

title: CyberVault
content: CyberVault is a community for cybersecurity enthusiasts, offering workshops, CTF competitions, and discussions on the latest security trends. The club aims to create awareness about ethical hacking, data privacy, and securing digital footprints.

title: MLSA
content: The MLSA program is a global initiative by Microsoft to empower students with technical skills and leadership opportunities. At KIIT, the MLSA chapter conducts workshops, hackathons, and seminars on Microsoft's latest technologies and tools.

title: Google Developer Group
content: GDG Bhubaneswar is a vibrant community of developers passionate about Google technologies. The group organizes meetups, code labs, and conferences, fostering collaboration and innovation in areas such as Android, Web Development, and Machine Learning.
